docs.description: A Product or a Service that is bought, sold or kept in stock.

fields.description: If item is a variant of another item then description, image, pricing, taxes etc will be set from the template unless explicitly specified

fields.description:
Example: ABCD.#####
If series is set and Serial No is not mentioned in transactions, then automatic serial number will be created based on this series. If you always want to explicitly mention Serial Nos for this item. leave this blank.
fields.label: Serial Number Series
